titles.title: Family Friendly HSA Improvement Act of 2013
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit the medical expenses of dependents who have not attained age 27 to be paid from a health savings account.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/13/2013--Introduced. Family Friendly HSA Improvement Act of 2013 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to health savings accounts (HSAs), to increase (up to age 27) the age limit for dependents whose medical expenses may be paid from such accounts.
